data.decision: Security implementation order: (1) Execution-path policy gate, (2) Workspace allowlist + file op constraints, (3) Secrets out of prompts + log redaction, (4) Sandbox browser automation, (5) Audit log + replay, (6) Prompt injection firewall
data.rationale: Policy gate is the constitution - everything else depends on it being in the execution path. Can't enforce workspace limits without a gate. Can't redact secrets without a gate. Order optimizes for "each layer enables the next" rather than "easiest first".
data.context: Building production-grade security for Duro agent workers. Current state: advisory gates exist but not enforced in execution path.
